1285570.name: Chronac Demo
1285570.description:
Welcome to CHRONAC! You become sentient in a facility that tests its combat robots by making them fight each other.
Now you must escape your creators... or stay to be tested forever.

features:
  • Original art and gameplay brimming with personality.
  • Created mostly by one person.
  • You are pitted against each other in different game modes.
  • Using different weapons and/or bots, try to outwit your opponent!
  • If you decide to escape, be prepared to fight unforgiving enemies.
  • You can escape alone, or bring a friend!
1285570.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
